data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bird, Graham J. (2012): A new leptochelioid family, Heterotanoididae (Crustacea: Peracarida: Tanaidacea), and a new species of Heterotanoides from New Zealand. Zootaxa 3481: 1-26, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.213112
